description: Details of landscaping for that phase including all planting, hard surfacing materials, timing of the delivery and management of the soft landscaping pursuant to condition 8 of planning permission ref 244038VAR dated 17/04/2025 for the; Minor Material Amendment (S.73) to Outline Planning Permission 214662OUT dated 27/10/2022 for 'The erection of four residential blocks ranging in height from 4 to 9 storeys to provide 149 homes; alterations to existing vehicular access and new pedestrian access from Wood End Gardens with basement level car parking, car club, cycle parking, refuse storage, service areas and associated communal amenity space and landscaping (All details of access, appearance, layout, scale considered and landscaping matters reserved). Amendment seeks to amend the wording of conditions 1, 3, 5, 6, 8, 9, 10, 11, 12, 13, 14, 15, 16, 18, 19, 20, 21, 22, 24, 26, 27, 30, 35, and 36, and to vary the S106 to enable a phased implementation of the development; and the  submission of a Construction Traffic Management Plan for proposed phase 1'
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
